english_example_sentence: My friend, you always stay in this small room.
russian_example_sentence: Мой друг, ты всегда остаешься в этой маленькой комнате.
turkish_example_sentence: Arkadaşım, sen bu küçük odada hep kalırsın.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Arkadaşım, sen bu küçük odada hep ______.
